question: With my first i had preeclampsia and had an induction at 36 weeks. I am expecting again, i went to my first check up Christmas eve. I have high blood pressure once again at 13 weeks 5 days. What can happen if this gets detected so early this time??!! Or worse case can i expect to be on bed rest?
title: high blood pressure
